item.title: Houson, Texas | Weekly Eviction Reports | Eviction Lab
item.description: Houston, Texas April 28, 2020 Eviction filings in the last week continue to be lower than the average from 2012 to 2016. An eviction moratorium is currently in place which has had a chilling effect on filings since it was invoked on March 19, 2020. Filings Last Week () Filings Last 4 Weeks () Eviction Moratorium March 19 - April 30, 2020 Share on Twitter Share on Facebook var tableUrl = "
